battle.revive:
## üòá You Revived!
You were revived by üç∂ Revival and your HP is restored to **{hp}**.
You're ready to fight again!
battle.lose:
## üíÄ You Lost!
You were defeated by the monster! But you rise again with **{hp} HP**.
battle.levelup:
## üéâ Level Up!
You reached level **{level}**!
Your stats increased! üí™
Your HP is restored to **{hp}**.
battle.win:
## üéâ You Won!
You defeated **{monster}**!
You earned **{gold} gold** and **{xp} XP**!
battle.round:
## ‚öîÔ∏è Adventure Battle!
**{user}** attacks **{monster}**, dealing **{playerDamage}** damage!
**{monster}** strikes back, dealing **{monsterDamage}** damage!

empty.title: No Items Available
empty.desc: There are no items available in this category at the moment.

stick.name: Stick
stick.desc: A simple stick found in the woods. Better than nothing?

rock.name: Rock
rock.desc: A hard rock. Good for throwing.

dagger.name: Dagger
dagger.desc: A small but sharp blade. Quick and deadly.

wooden_club.name: Wooden Club
wooden_club.desc: A heavy piece of wood. Hits hard.

slingshot.name: Slingshot
slingshot.desc: Shoots small stones. Good for ranged attacks.

training_sword.name: Training Sword
training_sword.desc: A dull sword used for practice.

bronze_sword.name: Bronze Sword
bronze_sword.desc: A sword made of bronze. Stronger than wood.

bronze_axe.name: Bronze Axe
bronze_axe.desc: A heavy axe made of bronze.

iron_sword.name: Iron Sword
iron_sword.desc: A sharp iron sword. A reliable weapon.

iron_mace.name: Iron Mace
iron_mace.desc: A spiked iron mace. Crushes armor.

spear.name: Spear
spear.desc: A long weapon with a sharp tip. Keeps enemies at bay.

battle_axe.name: Battle Axe
battle_axe.desc: A large double-headed axe. devastating power.

long_sword.name: Long Sword
long_sword.desc: A long blade with excellent reach.

crossbow.name: Crossbow
crossbow.desc: Powerful ranged weapon with high accuracy.

steel_sword.name: Steel Sword
steel_sword.desc: A finely crafted steel sword. Very sharp.

steel_halberd.name: Steel Halberd
steel_halberd.desc: A versatile polearm made of steel.

war_hammer.name: War Hammer
war_hammer.desc: A massive hammer designed to crush skulls.

katana.name: Katana
katana.desc: A curved blade from a distant land. Extremely sharp.

great_sword.name: Great Sword
great_sword.desc: A gigantic sword that requires immense strength.

obsidian_blade.name: Obsidian Blade
obsidian_blade.desc: A sword with a blade as black as night. incredibly sharp.

obsidian_scythe.name: Obsidian Scythe
obsidian_scythe.desc: A reaper's tool made of obsidian.

mithril_blade.name: Mithril Blade
mithril_blade.desc: A legendary blade made of mithril. Light and indestructible.

mithril_bow.name: Mithril Bow
mithril_bow.desc: A bow reinforced with mithril. Shoots with incredible force.

crystal_sword.name: Crystal Sword
crystal_sword.desc: A sword forged from magical crystal.

crystal_wand.name: Crystal Wand
crystal_wand.desc: A wand pulsing with magical energy.

demon_blade.name: Demon Blade
demon_blade.desc: A cursed blade that thirsts for blood.

dragon_slayer.name: Dragon Slayer
dragon_slayer.desc: A massive sword said to be able to kill dragons.

void_staff.name: Void Staff
void_staff.desc: A staff that channels the power of the void.

god_killer.name: God Killer
god_killer.desc: A weapon capable of slaying gods.

leather_cap.name: Leather Cap
leather_cap.desc: A simple cap made of leather.

bronze_helm.name: Bronze Helm
bronze_helm.desc: A sturdy helmet made of bronze.

copper_helm.name: Copper Helm
copper_helm.desc: A shiny helmet made of copper.

iron_helm.name: Iron Helm
iron_helm.desc: A strong helmet that protects the head.

steel_helm.name: Steel Helm
steel_helm.desc: A heavy helmet offering excellent protection.

obsidian_helm.name: Obsidian Helm
obsidian_helm.desc: A dark helmet forged from obsidian.

dragon_helm.name: Dragon Helm
dragon_helm.desc: A helmet crafted from dragon scales.

chainmail.name: Chainmail
chainmail.desc: Armor made of interlocking metal rings.

iron_armor.name: Iron Armor
iron_armor.desc: Heavy plate armor made of iron.

steel_armor.name: Steel Armor
steel_armor.desc: Superior plate armor made of steel.

mithril_armor.name: Mithril Armor
mithril_armor.desc: Legendary armor that is light as a feather.

dragon_armor.name: Dragon Armor
dragon_armor.desc: Armor forged from the scales of an ancient dragon.

wooden_shield.name: Wooden Shield
wooden_shield.desc: A basic shield made of wood.

buckler.desc: A small shield for parrying attacks.

bronze_shield.name: Bronze Shield
bronze_shield.desc: A round shield made of bronze.

iron_shield.name: Iron Shield
iron_shield.desc: A sturdy shield made of iron.

steel_shield.name: Steel Shield
steel_shield.desc: A heavy shield that blocks most attacks.

tower_shield.name: Tower Shield
tower_shield.desc: A massive shield that covers the whole body.

obsidian_shield.name: Obsidian Shield
obsidian_shield.desc: A black shield that is incredibly hard.

mithril_shield.name: Mithril Shield
mithril_shield.desc: An indestructible shield made of mithril.

aegis.name: Aegis
aegis.desc: The legendary shield of the gods.

apple.name: Apple
apple.desc: A fresh red apple. Restores a small amount of health.

bandage.name: Bandage
bandage.desc: A cloth bandage to bind wounds.

bread.name: Bread
bread.desc: A loaf of fresh bread. Filling and healing.

small_health_potion.name: Small Health Potion
small_health_potion.desc: A small vial of healing liquid.

great_health_potion.name: Great Health Potion
great_health_potion.desc: A potent potion that heals significant wounds.

hyper_potion.name: Hyper Potion
hyper_potion.desc: An advanced potion that heals almost any injury.

revival.name: Revival Potion
revival.desc: Brings you back to life with 50% health when defeated.

Your character has been created! You are ready to start your adventure! üéâ

Use `/adventure battle` to start fighting or `/adventure stats` to view your status.

shadow_blade.name: Elara
shadow_blade.desc: Glass cannon assassin. High damage, low defense.

iron_guardian.name: Kaelen
iron_guardian.desc: Immovable sentinel. High defense and survivability.

stormcaller.name: Lyra
stormcaller.desc: Elemental adept. Balanced power with extra experience.

gilded_ranger.name: Arion
gilded_ranger.desc: Treasure seeker. Earns extra gold from victories.

aurora_monk.name: Sora
aurora_monk.desc: Disciplined fighter. Extra HP and steady growth.
